name: Sneak Thief
description: Sneak Thief is a first person, shooter, strategy, stealth and puzzle game that lets you choose how you want to play. Use your wits and expertise to setup and perform heists whether that be by using brute force to smash your way through or by getting away without making a sound.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or later Processor: Dual Core Processor @2.4 ghz or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or better DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: Tested at 1280x720 on Low Settings
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: Intel Core i3 or AMD equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 11 Graphics Card DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: Tested at 1920x1080 on High Settings
